General.Name: Mahkota Group Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mahkota Group Tbk engages in the palm oil processing businesses in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Palm Oil and Logistics. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernel, refined bleached deodorized palm oil, fatty acid destilade, palm kernel oil, palm kernel expeller, and other derivative products. It also provides storage tank rental services for liquid bulk products, such as liquid chemicals, CPO, etc. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Mahkota Group Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Mahkota Global Investama.
General.Address: Grand Jati Junction Complex Lt.27, Medan, Indonesia, 20231
